description.narrative: Support the Government of Brazil’s ongoing efforts to coordinate the implementation of the Brazil Investment Plan, under Forest Investment Program, which seeks to promote sustainable land use and forest management improvement in the Cerrado Biome, contributing to a reduction in pressure on the remaining dry forests and in greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, and to an increase in carbon dioxide (CO2) sequestration; and enhance the capacity of Inter-Ministerial Executive Committee’s capacity to coordinate, supervise, monitor and evaluate the Brazil Investment Plan implementation.
